full_summary:
<Title>
Title: Invitation to Tender – High Slope Riding Mower
(Titre) Invitation à soumissionner - Tondeuse à gazon autoportée pour terrain à pente forte</Title>
**Reference Number:** CB-410-77820363
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W8476-256890/A
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-01
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-07T14:00:00

**Contract Details:**
Procurement Category: Goods (catégorie d'approvisionnement: produits)
UNSpsc Code: 27112000 (Outils à main pour l'agriculture, la sylviculture et le jardin)
Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding (méthode d'approvisionnement concurrentielle)
Selection Criteria: Lowest Price (Critères de sélection: prix le plus bas)

**Contract Requirements:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide one (1) High Slope Riding Mower for delivery to St-Jean (Quebec). The requested delivery date is 180 days after receipt of order.

**Note on Canadian Content Policy:**
This solicitation is subject to Canadian Content Policy.

**Note on Contract Terms:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Submissions Guidelines:**
Submissions must be submitted by e-mail only to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Note on Electronic Submission of Bids:**
For details, please review the section entitled Electronic Submission of Bids in the solicitation document.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or concerns, please contact Dong Le at dong.le@forces.gc.ca or (999) 999-9999.

Below is the list of attachments related to the solicitation:

* Amendment 002: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37226/en-rfp-w8476-256890-a-amendment-001.pdf
* Amendment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37226/bt500_w8476-256890_rfp-original.pdf
* Amendment 002: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37226/en-rfp-w8476-256890-a-amendment
